name: LD37 - Find The Room
description:
FIND THE ROOM!
One room to rule them all... or something like this.

CONTROLS:
Q W E
A S D

Q - Menu
WASD - The usual stuff, up left, ...
E - Interact

Codestuff: Daniel Schruff (Iak)
Artstuff: Dmitrij Jazunov (Rik)

All assets were created during the Jam.
(we basically followed Compo Rules, just as a Team and with 72h)

Programs used:
Some graphics stuff.
Some sound recording stuff.
Game Maker Studio (Free).
